Class Cell

java.lang.Object
  Cell

public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object

Cell.java Contains information about and operations for an individual Cell in a Sudoku puzzle North Haven High School Team The Fedoras Teacher Marilynn Kramar Students Charlie Hoyt, Lily Seropian, Mike Perrone, Vincent Jakiela, Victor Wang, and Prakhar Bansal Email: cthoyt@gmail.com, lilyseropian@gmail.com, mike.j.perrone@gmail.com, vtjakiela@yahoo.com, wangvictor09@hotmail.com, prakhar_bansal2005@hotmail.com, Kramar.Marilynn@north-haven.k12.ct.us

Version:
1.8 unrolled We pledge that our team has followed all rules for the case study.
Author:
The Fedoras

Field Detail

numSolved

public static int numSolved
The number of Cells in the Sudoku program that have been solved. Used to determine if the puzzle is solved.

Constructor Detail

Cell

public Cell()
Creates a Cell whose value is unknown.

Cell

public Cell(int numIn)
Creates a Cell whose value is already determined

Parameters:
int - numIn contains the value of the cell
Method Detail

getPossibilities

public boolean[] getPossibilities()
Gets a list detailing whether the value at each index + 1 can go in that Cell

Returns:
boolean[9] where returnedArray[0] = true means that a 1 can go in that spot in the Cell

getPossibility

public boolean getPossibility(int i)
Gets a particular item from the possibility list at index i

Returns:
boolean true means that i+1 can go in that cell
See Also:
getPossibilities()

isNotSolved

public boolean isNotSolved()
Checks if the Cell's value has been set

Returns:
boolean true if the Cell's value has not been found yet

isSolved

public boolean isSolved()
Checks if the Cell's value has been set

Returns:
boolean true if the Cell's value has been found (or was initially entered)

processPossibilityList

public void processPossibilityList()
Sets the cell's value to index for only remaining true value in array of possibilities. If it solves the Cell, increments numSolved.

toInt

public int toInt()
Gets the value of the Cell as an integer

Returns:
int num (Cell's value 0-8)

updatePossibilities

public void updatePossibilities(boolean[] input)
Updates the list detailing whether the value at each index + 1 can go in that Cell

Parameters:
boolean[9] - contains new values
